Bounded Value
=============



```
concept {
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:Name -> IfcIdentifier
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:Description -> IfcText
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:UpperBoundValue -> IfcValue_0
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:LowerBoundValue -> IfcValue_1
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:SetPointValue -> IfcValue_2
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:Name[binding="PropertyName"]
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:UpperBoundValue[binding="UpperValue"]
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:LowerBoundValue[binding="LowerValue"]
    IfcPropertyBoundedValue:SetPointValue[binding="SetValue"]
}
```
